assessment_item.title: BLUUSMQ6 The gravitational potential energy of the Sun and Earth is denoted as USE, the gravitational potential energy of the Sun and mass M is denoted by USM. Choose the write option.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

The gravitational potential energy of the Sun and Earth is denoted as USE, the gravitational potential energy of the Sun and mass M is denoted by USM. Choose the write option.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

U_{SE}=U_{SM}

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:987"},{"text":"

U_{SE}>U_{SM}

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:988"},{"text":"

U_{SE}<U_{SM}

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:998"},{"text":"

U_{SE}=-U_{SM}
